scripts.start: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build && npm run -s serve
scripts.build: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build-ts && npm run -s build-html && npm run -s build-package
scripts.build-html: cp src/examples/*.html dist/examples/ && cp src/examples/class/*.html dist/examples/class/
scripts.test: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build-tests && npm run -s build-package && npm run -s wtr
scripts.test-debug: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build-tests && npm run -s build-package && npm run -s wtr-debug
